segments.text: Julia , burglaries in our town have been on the wing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that a robbery happened in our town several days ago . The robbers ripped off a car in broad daylight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank God , we haven't encountered a burglar . I hope that our house is secure against burglary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am worrying about it too . I want to install a security door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . The security door is so firm that nobody can break in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I totally agree with you . In this way I won't be afraid of the burglar if you are away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will do it right now .
segments.speaker: S1
